1.0.name: wordpress/2-waysms-messenger
1.0.description:
2-WaySMS allows send SMS messages with your own Sender ID.

Sender ID (Company Name, Your Name, etc) - it can be numeric or alphanumeric (0-9, a-Z up to 11 characters).

You just have to install plugin and type your account information from 2-WaySMS http://www.2-waysms.com .

SMS plugin messenger with reliable SMS gateway connection. Sending to more than 220 countries. Local SMS numbers for messages receiving of more than 43 countries are available.

Check out the 2-WaySMS Messenger plugin video:
